fields.description:
*Summary*

The setup is a single-cluster 3.3.2 cloud, with tunneling enabled.  We are seeing scenarios where the CLC partitions the CC which transitions into a NOTREADY state, which then causes the nodes to do the same (see euca-describe-nodes).  

*Description*

Cloud running 3.3.2 and in single-cluster topology.

The CC is moving into a NOTREADY state every few hours at this point. From the CC logs we see no problems at all, it seems like it is behaving as expected.  From the cloud logs we see logs of continual partition errors. 

*Assessment*

This is currently a service affecting issue and critical in nature due to constantly needing to restart the CC.

*Signs*

Instances cannot be launched and cannot be reached.

*Actions*

Restarting the CLC resolves the issue for a while.

*Pertinent Data*

Although restarting the CC resolves the issue initially, the issue comes back every 1 to 2 hours.

See the two newest files, one is from the CC and the other from the front-end.

cloud-error log reveals:

{code}arn:euca:eucalyptus:acme11_1:cluster:cc_1-amce10203/ NOTREADY->DISABLED=NOTREADY [No transition to PENDING from current state State:name=arn:euca:eucalyptus:acme11_1:cluster:cc_1acme10203/:state=ENABLED:mark=false:transition=idle. Known transitions: [Transition name=ENABLED_SERVICES from=ENABLED/false to=ENABLED_SERVICE_CHECK/false error=NOTREADY action=com.eucalyptus.cluster.Cluster$Refresh$1@48f43a39, Transition name=ENABLED_ADDRS from=ENABLED_SERVICE_CHECK/false to=ENABLED_ADDRS/false error=NOTREADY action=com.eucalyptus.cluster.Cluster$Refresh$1@82fb9b9, Transition name=ENABLING_RESOURCES from=ENABLING/false to=ENABLING_RESOURCES/false error=NOTREADY action=com.eucalyptus.cluster.Cluster$Refresh$1@57ff3706, Transition name=RESTART_BROKEN from=BROKEN/false to=PENDING/false error=BROKEN action=TransitionAction.noop, Transition name=ENABLE from=DISABLED/false to=ENABLING/false error=DISABLED action=com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.Transitions$4@3a4c1a90, Transition name=ENABLING_ADDRS from=ENABLING_VMS/false to=ENABLING_ADDRS/false error=NOTREADY action=com.eucalyptus.cluster.Cluster$Refresh$1@4f0e7e9f, Transition name=AUTHENTICATE from=PENDING/false to=AUTHENTICATING/false error=PENDING action=com.eucalyptus.cluster.Cluster$LogRefresh$1@7d5ec05a, Transition name=STOP from=DISABLED/false to=STOPPED/false error=PENDING action=TransitionAction.noop, Transition name=ENABLING_NET from=ENABLING_RESOURCES/false to=ENABLING_NET/false error=NOTREADY action=com.eucalyptus.cluster.Cluster$Refresh$1@7ac5179d, Transition name=ENABLED from=ENABLED_VMS/false to=ENABLED/false error=NOTREADY action=com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.Transitions$3@5d5e288a, Transition name=ENABLING_VMS from=ENABLING_NET/false to=ENABLING_VMS/false error=NOTREADY action=com.eucalyptus.cluster.Cluster$Refresh$1@5dc130d3, Transition name=ENABLED_VMS from=ENABLED_NET/false to=ENABLED_VMS/false error=NOTREADY action=com.eucalyptus.cluster.Cluster$Refresh$1@efc2568, Transition name=START_CHECK from=STARTING/false to=STARTING_NOTREADY/false error=PENDING action=com.eucalyptus.cluster.Cluster$Refresh$1@2bac1cb1, Transition name=ENABLING_ADDRS_PASS_TWO from=ENABLING_VMS_PASS_TWO/false to=ENABLING_ADDRS_PASS_TWO/false error=NOTREADY action=com.eucalyptus.cluster.Cluster$Refresh$1@28873df2, Transition name=START from=AUTHENTICATING/false to=STARTING/false error=PENDING action=TransitionAction.noop, Transition name=DISABLE from=ENABLED/false to=DISABLED/false error=NOTREADY action=com.eucalyptus.util.fsm.Transitions$4@5edfb0ac, Transition name=ENABLING_ADDRS_PASS_TWO from=ENABLING_ADDRS_PASS_TWO/false to=ENABLED/false error=NOTREADY action=com.eucalyptus.cluster.Cluster$Refresh$1@76417ff2, Transition name=PRESTART from=STOPPED/false to=PENDING/false error=PENDING action=TransitionAction.noop, Transition name=ENABLED_RSC from=ENABLED_ADDRS/false to=ENABLED_RSC/false error=NOTREADY action=com.eucalyptus.cluster.Cluster$Refresh$1@d9e7b51, Transition name=DISABLEDCHECK from=DISABLED/false to=DISABLED/false error=NOTREADY action=com.eucalyptus.cluster.Cluster$Refresh$1@29f9e31b, Transition name=STARTING_SERVICES from=STARTING_NOTREADY/false to=NOTREADY/false error=PENDING action=com.eucalyptus.cluster.Cluster$Refresh$1@485a5ad9, Transition name=ENABLED_NET from=ENABLED_RSC/false to=ENABLED_NET/false error=NOTREADY action=com.eucalyptus.cluster.Cluster$Refresh$1@18c8c6f2, Transition name=ENABLING_VMS_PASS_TWO from=ENABLING_ADDRS/false to=ENABLING_VMS_PASS_TWO/false error=NOTREADY action=com.eucalyptus.cluster.Cluster$Refresh$1@43a4b1c6, Transition name=NOTREADYCHECK from=NOTREADY/false to=DISABLED/false error=NOTREADY action=com.eucalyptus.cluster.Cluster$Refresh$1@6bacb988]] {code}

We also see errors like this in CC log:  

{code}
2013-10-17 15:31:07 ERROR | BUG: child process 9573 handling 'ncDescribeSensors' was terminated with 11 (core=0){code}

*Workaround*

Restart the CLC.
fields.summary: CC partitioned and drops into NOTREADY state
fields.environment:
*non-HA*

* single cluster, Managed networking mode
** 1 x CLC, Walrus
** 1 x CC, SC

comments.body:
[~graziano], 

yes I do have the logs and in the process of reviewing them.
Resolved as a duplicate of EUCA-8510 and EUCA-8567.

Was able to reproduce this with [~viglesias] and [~nurmi] last night.

Looks like there are several problems at play here:
* There is a case in {{AsyncRequestHandler.java}} which can lead to the channel never being closed or receiving an event which would fulfill it's future.  There is a pass at a fix to it in {{dev/grze/angrysocketsinspace}}.
* {{Cluster.enable()}} and {{Cluster.check()}} both interact with {{NodeControllerConfigurationBuilder.fireCheck()}} badly insofar as:
## {{Cluster}} the sends the CC a DescribeResources request
## A coincidental call by the {{Topology}} service leads to an invocation of {{NodeControllderConfigurationBuilder.fireCheck()}} for *SOMENC* making that state machine busy.
## {{ResourceStateCallback.fire()}}, keeps socket open while updating the {{Nodes}}
## {{Nodes.updateConfig()}}'s codepath launches individual requests for every {{NC}}
## Which would then include *SOMENC* from above.
##*SOMENC*'s state machine is in transiition already and this leads to a screw up that leads to a live lock between the update of the cluster and the NC's service state.
* It looks as if all of this is precipitated or at least preceded by a collection of failures by the CLC in messaging the CC about it and NCs' states.

{code}
   1 2014-02-05 00:24:05 DEBUG 000016974 ResourceStateCallback    | Adding node service tags: NodeType 10.111.5.158 iqn.1994-05.com.redhat:b2d1ae36e5a, NodeType 10.111.5.161 iqn.1994-05.com.redhat:2e6d843b62, NodeType 10.111.5.160 iqn.1994-05.com.redhat:4250e75b1e6, NodeType 10.111.5.177 iqn.1994-05.com.redhat:de3f585dbbb8
   1 2014-02-05 00:25:37 ERROR 000016974 ResourceStateCallback    | java.lang.RuntimeException: com.eucalyptus.util.async.ConnectionException: Channel was closed before the response was received.:DescribeServicesType:55041ad9-e4ac-410f-a92a-a91566177efd:return=true:epoch=32:status=null
   1 2014-02-05 00:26:04 DEBUG 000017058 ResourceStateCallback    | Request to default-cc-1 failed: com.eucalyptus.util.async.ConnectionException: Channel was closed before the response was received.::null-467719:return=true:epoch=32:status=null::null-467719:return=true:epoch=32:status=null
  10 2014-02-05 00:26:20 DEBUG 000016974 ResourceStateCallback    | Request to default-cc-1 failed: com.eucalyptus.util.async.ConnectionException: Channel was closed before the response was received.::null-236403:return=true:epoch=32:status=null::null-236403:return=true:epoch=32:status=null
   1 2014-02-05 00:26:28 DEBUG 000017086 ResourceStateCallback    | Request to default-cc-1 failed: com.eucalyptus.util.async.ConnectionException: Channel was closed before the response was received.::null-431232:return=true:epoch=32:status=null::null-431232:return=true:epoch=32:status=null
   1 2014-02-05 00:26:37 ERROR 000017039 Cluster                  | arn:euca:eucalyptus:default:cluster:default-cc-1/ checking: java.lang.RuntimeException: com.eucalyptus.util.async.ConnectionException: Channel was closed before the response was received.::null-908019:return=true:epoch=32:status=null
   1                           | Caused by: com.eucalyptus.util.async.ConnectionException: Channel was closed before the response was received.::null-908019:return=true:epoch=32:status=null
   1 2014-02-05 00:26:37 ERROR 000017039 Cluster                  | default-cc-1: Error communicating with cluster: com.eucalyptus.util.async.ConnectionException: Channel was closed before the response was received.::null-908019:return=true:epoch=32:status=null
   1 2014-02-05 00:26:37 DEBUG 000017086 NetworkStateCallback     | Request to default-cc-1 failed: com.eucalyptus.util.async.ConnectionException: Channel was closed before the response was received.::null-908019:return=true:epoch=32:status=null::null-908019:return=true:epoch=32:status=null
   1 2014-02-05 00:27:37 ERROR 000017039 Cluster                  | arn:euca:eucalyptus:default:cluster:default-cc-1/ checking: java.lang.RuntimeException: com.eucalyptus.util.async.ConnectionException: Channel was closed before the response was received.:DisableServiceType:83f177b0-ca03-4593-88b5-23ab9fd8131c:return=true:epoch=32:status=null
   1                           | Caused by: com.eucalyptus.util.async.ConnectionException: Channel was closed before the response was received.:DisableServiceType:83f177b0-ca03-4593-88b5-23ab9fd8131c:return=true:epoch=32:status=null
   1 2014-02-05 00:27:37 ERROR 000017039 Cluster                  | default-cc-1: Error communicating with cluster: com.eucalyptus.util.async.ConnectionException: Channel was closed before the response was received.:DisableServiceType:83f177b0-ca03-4593-88b5-23ab9fd8131c:return=true:epoch=32:status=null
   1 2014-02-05 00:27:37  INFO 000000019 ClusterBuilder           | Disabling cluster: ServiceConfiguration cluster arn:euca:eucalyptus:default:cluster:default-cc-1/ 10.111.5.159:8774:/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC:host-local:ENABLED
   1 2014-02-05 00:27:37  INFO 000000019 ClusterBuilder           | :1391588857865:ClusterBuilder:COMPONENT_SERVICE_DISABLED:cluster:default-cc-1:http://10.111.5.159:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC
   1 2014-02-05 00:28:37 ERROR 000000019 Cluster                  | arn:euca:eucalyptus:default:cluster:default-cc-1/ checking: java.lang.RuntimeException: com.eucalyptus.util.async.ConnectionException: Channel was closed before the response was received.:DescribeServicesType:52aa52bd-88e2-48d1-8946-00ca698f13c9:return=true:epoch=32:status=null
   1                           | Caused by: com.eucalyptus.util.async.ConnectionException: Channel was closed before the response was received.:DescribeServicesType:52aa52bd-88e2-48d1-8946-00ca698f13c9:return=true:epoch=32:status=null
   1 2014-02-05 00:28:37 ERROR 000000019 Cluster                  | default-cc-1: Error communicating with cluster: com.eucalyptus.util.async.ConnectionException: Channel was closed before the response was received.:DescribeServicesType:52aa52bd-88e2-48d1-8946-00ca698f13c9:return=true:epoch=32:status=null
{code}
Not seeing the deadlock anymore. Have run ~30k instances on my setup using a script that runs 50 at a time for over 4 days.
